course_info.Course Title: Storytelling and Storyboarding with Generative AI
Learning Outcomes: LO1: Use generative AI techniques to develop compelling script elements enriched with narrative structure and creative storytelling.
LO2: Identify effective prompt terms and narrative components to enhance AI-generated storyboards for visual storytelling.
LO3: Utilise generative AI tools to refine video scripts for clarity, tone, and narrative consistency.
LO4: Analyse generative AI outputs for ethical issues, bias, and copyright risks, applying appropriate corrective actions.
course_info.TSC Title: AI Content Generation for Script Development

analyst_responses.What are the performance gaps in the ind: There is a significant gap in the ability to effectively utilize AI tools for enhancing visual storytelling. Many professionals struggle with creating visually appealing storyboards that align with narrative elements. This gap is exacerbated by a lack of understanding of AI tool limitations and how to overcome them.
analyst_responses.Why do you think this WSQ course will ad: The course provides hands-on experience with AI tools, teaching participants how to generate and refine storyboards. By understanding AI limitations and applying iterative techniques, participants can improve the quality of visual storytelling. This practical approach ensures that learners can create visually compelling content that complements their narratives.
